file_content.text: Good to have you back on duty, Cipher Nine.
Sir, it's--go on ahead. Keeper is inside.
Go on inside. Keeper is waiting.
This is Watcher Three to Cipher Nine. Sorry to cut your leave short, sir, but we need you.
Terrorist mop-up is officially over, and post-Eradication rebuilding is on hold. The war just took top priority.
Terrorist mop-up is officially over, and the search for Lord Jadus is on hold. The war just took top priority.
I was starting to wonder if I'd been permanently reassigned.
No, sir. Just an emergency measure.
You're being recalled to headquarters; Keeper will brief you on your next mission. Watcher Three out.
I spent my "leave" fighting for my life. I know what things are like.
